newsitem.title: CHINA: City Telecom debuts at HK$1.85/share.
newsitem.headline: City Telecom debuts at HK$1.85/share.

text.p: Shares of telecommunication services provider City Telecom (HK) Ltd made their trading debut at HK$1.85 per share, compared with their issue price of HK$1.80 each.
City Telecom, a long-distance call-back operator, offered 100 million new shares at HK$1.80 each in an initial public offering (IPO) of shares in Hong Kong. Its IPO was only 2.85 times subscribed.

The company had said the net proceeds raised from the issue would be used to buy premises for the establishment of a switching centre in Hong Kong, to upgrade its telecommunication network and to set up switching systems in Japan.
It said proceeds would also be used for research and development of new services and new communications technologies, with the the balance for working capital.
